resources.string: List navigation requires the use of a special layout for the spinner item. Failure to use it will result in your spinner text being the same color as the action bar background on pre-3.0. See the source code of this demo for more information.

Tabs can be useful for switching between a limited number of items. You can also collapse the main body of the action bar on small devices so that only the tab bar is displayed. See the source for more information.
